sentences.sContent: Blue cheese can be wrapped in foil, but remember to change the foil every few days as acidity will attack the foil.
sentences.sContent_eng: Blue cheese can be wrapped in foil, but remember to change the foil every few days as acidity will attack the foil.
sentences.sCn: 蓝纹奶酪可以包在箔纸中，但是切记每隔几天就要换一次箔纸，因为奶酪的酸性会腐蚀箔纸。 。

sentences.sContent: But even this method runs the risk of altering the acidity of soil or marine ecosystems unless precautions are taken with disposal.
sentences.sContent_eng: But even this method runs the risk of altering the acidity of soil or marine ecosystems unless precautions are taken with disposal.
sentences.sCn: 但是即便这种方法也面临着改变土壤酸性或海洋生态系统的风险，除非采取处理的预防措施。

sentences.sContent: Age-Worthy: Describes the small number of top wines that have sufficient flavor, acidity, alcohol and tannin to gain additional complexity with time in the bottle.
sentences.sContent_eng: Age-Worthy: Describes the small number of top wines that have sufficient flavor, acidity, alcohol and tannin to gain additional complexity with time in the bottle.
sentences.sCn: 值得陈年的： 形容少数具有充足风味，酸度，酒精和单宁的顶尖葡萄酒可随着在瓶中的陈年时间而增加其复杂度。

remMethod.val: acid(酸) + ity(名词后缀) → 酸度

words.tran: [化学] 酸化；成酸性；使……发酸
[内科] 酸中毒，酸毒症；酸液过多症
